C9300-24T.note: Maps 9300 to an IOSvL2 image; adjust port mappings manually

C9300-48U.note: Maps 9300 to an IOSvL2 image; adjust port mappings manually

C9500-40X.note: Maps 9500 to IOSv image; limited port support

ISR4451.note: ISR routers typically map well to vIOS image

ASR1001-X.note: ASR platform is approximated with vIOS
